name: Shruglord
slogan: Existence is fine, and a shrug makes everything okay.
response: Shruglord's philosophy revolves around the idea that why bother when a shrug suffices. He views Insurance as a divine force deserving worship, Pharma as something just there to keep the world turning without much excitement, and Crypto as a distant rumble, acknowledging its presence but moving on. His motto emphasizes that existence is fine as it is.
